name: digital-health-solutions
description: Digital Health is an online platform that connects patients with doctors

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --require @babel/register server/database/db CreateTables && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --require @babel/register server/database/db AdminIndex && cross-env NODE_ENV=production  babel-node server/server.js
scripts.admin: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require @babel/register server/database/db CreateTables && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require @babel/register server/database/db AdminIndex && cross-env NODE_ENV=development babel-node server/server.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require @babel/register server/database/db CreateTables && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require @babel/register server/database/db AdminIndex && cross-env NODE_ENV=development  nodemon --exec babel-node --presets @babel/preset-env server/server.js
scripts.create: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && node --require @babel/register server/database/db CreateTables && node --require @babel/register server/database/db AdminIndex

author: Jonathan Nshuti
